title: WTB: M. Brown Cubs Shirt w/Sov or Hindu back (Last card to finish the Monster!)
author: Silverskulls

posts.post_title: WTB: M. Brown Cubs Shirt w/Sov or Hindu back (Last card to finish the Monster!)
posts.post_content:
Hi folks- Thanks in large part to many great N54 folks, I'm at 519 and would love your help knocking out the last card to complete my Monster. 

Looking for low grades (raw or A-2 slabbed):

M. Brown Throwing Cubs on Shirt (Sov or Hindu back)

Thanks in advance!

Justin
Good luck, Justin!  I'm in the same boat, only needing 2 to 520
I’ll look for these at Hofstra tmrw, brother.
